definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be inclined, desire, be pleased (Targum Syr.; cf. BH II. [[חבה]]);—

definitions.title: Pe. 1.
definitions.body: desire: Pf. 1 S. [[חְבִית]] (K:§ 47 Beisp. 1) a) Nö:GGA, 1884, 1019 pf. intrans.) Da 7:19 (c. inf.).

be pleased, will (without hindrance), abs., of God: Impf. 3 ms. [[יִחְבֵּא]] Da 4:14, Da 4:22, Da 4:29; Inf. sf. [[מִחְבְּיֵהּ]] v:Da 4:32 acc. to his willing; of Neb.: Pt. act. [[חָבֵא]] Da 5:19, Da 5:19, Da 5:19, Da 5:19
